description: Try our easy to follow Chocolate Bubble Slice recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Pudding,Seafood free,Low salt,Wheat free,Egg free,Easter,Quick & easy dessert
name: Chocolate Bubble Slice Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Toast sesame seeds in a small frying pan over medium heat until golden. Tip into a large bowl; add rice bubbles, cocoa bombs and quinoa flakes.

Place butter and coconut spread in same small frying pan, stir over low heat until just melted. Stir into rice bubble mixture until well combined; making sure ingredients are coated in the melted mixture.
Grease a 16x26cm slice pan. Line base and 2 long sides with a sheet of baking paper. Spoon mixture into pan. Pressing down firmly with a spatula. Cover and refrigerate for 2 hours or until firm.

Lift slice onto a chopping board. Cut into squares. Store in an airtight container in the fridge for up to 7 days. Tip 1: These slices are best stored in the fridge or freezer for up to 2 weeks. Tip 2: You can swap the quinoa flakes with rolled oats and rice bubbles with organic puffed rice. Tip 3: It is essential to cut slice when it's completely set and chilled from the fridge. Use a very sharp knife and wipe away the crumbs on the blade with every cut.
